title: High-dose flu vaccines are 24% more effective than standard-dose vaccines. Learn more in our blog post. | PacificSource Health Plans posted on the topic | LinkedIn
description: High-dose #FluVaccines are 24% more effective than standard-dose #Flu vaccines in those age 65+ because it has four times the active ingredients. Learn more in...
